amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt actions by the Nuclear Regulatory Commission under the Atomic Energy Act from the provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 112-296 to exempt from the Act actions by the Nuclear Regulatory Commission under the Atomic Energy Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 247 (Roll no. 885).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Nadler.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 247 (Roll no. 885).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
